concept.title: Plan execution functions and standard libraries
concept.shortdesc: Your plan can execute multiple functions on remote systems.

conbody.p: Your plan can include functions to run commands, scripts, tasks, and other plans on remote nodes. These execution functions correspond to task runner commands.
conbody.note: All the $nodes arguments support the patterns supported by --nodes (except for shell expansion).
